p.k: April Fool To play an April fool’s trick on Lola Victor makes her believe that he has seen Hoodie in the subway whereas in fact Hoodie is actually locked in his room. The distraught Lola hurries out to look for her kitten followed by the prankster. But Pat figures...
p.d: Despite his small size and playful attitude, Pat is the hero that flies to his friends' rescue while avoiding numerous obstacles that get in his way.
